text: The Beijing Planning Exhibition Hall () is a museum dedicated to urban planning. The museum is in Beijing, China. It was opened in 2005 and was the first museum in China dedicated to urban planning. After it was opened, many urban planning museums were opened in Chinese cities. == Other websites == * Beijing Planning Exhibition Hall Category:Museums in China Category:Convention and exhibition centers Category:Buildings and structures in Beijing Category:Urban planning Category:2000s establishments in China Category:2005 establishments in Asia
title: Beijing Planning Exhibition Hall
